events.message: We received John's application for the software engineer position and the resume looks promising with relevant experience in backend development and cloud infrastructure.
John's application has been categorised under the Engineering cluster due to his extensive experience as a software developer with skills in Python and Kubernetes.
Recruiter Sarah has been assigned to John's case to coordinate the next steps in the hiring process for the engineering role.
The initial screening call was completed with John, who displayed strong communication skills and a good understanding of DevOps principles.
John responded promptly to the initial screening feedback and expressed enthusiasm for the upcoming technical interview.
The technical interview has been scheduled for John next week, focusing on system design, cloud architecture, and coding challenges.
